settings.heading: Micro-Infusion Creative Content Guide
settings.sub_heading:
Hey skincare enthusiasts!

Ready to take your content to the next level?

Our creative guide will help you craft engaging content that showcases how our innovative tool transforms skincare routines for radiant, glowing skin, so let's start!
settings.button_label: Learn more about the Micro-Infusion System

settings.heading: “Feeling good in your skin is not a privilege; it's a fundamental right, and we've set out on a mission to make it universally attainable.”
Merge Qure into your creatives
settings.bl_subheading: Key Points to include in the messaging:
settings.dropdown1_content: • The unique 2-in-1 system uses virtually painless needles to create invisible micro-channels in the top layer of your skin through a "stamping" technique. This controlled trauma stimulates the skin’s natural healing process, enhancing skin texture. Simultaneously, the invisible micro-channels allow science-backed serums to be infused directly below the skin barrier, delivering active ingredients more effectively for faster results - resulting in a rejuvenated, glowing complexion.
settings.dropdown2_heading: Why everyone is obsessing over Qure’s Micro-Infusion System
settings.dropdown2_content:
• Affordable and Convenient:
    Enjoy an at-home 5-minute treatment every 2 weeks that costs up to 15X less than professional in-clinic treatments, saving you both time and money.
  • Visible Results for Big Events:
    Ideal for quickly enhancing your skin before important occasions, with visible results after just one treatment.
  • Enhanced Serum Absorption:
    Delivers serum directly to the skin, increasing absorption for better results.
  • Safe and Easy to Use:
    Quick DIY at-home facial with little to no downtime. Single-use sterile needle heads help minimize the risk of infection or irritation caused by blunt and multi-use needles.
settings.dropdown3_heading: Serums to treat your specific skin concerns
settings.dropdown3_content: Your skin is unique,so your treatment should be. Choose between two serums (or both) you want to infuse with your Micro-Infusion device and experience a set of benefits tailored toyourexact skin concerns.
settings.serum_yellow_heading: For dark spots and uneven skin tone choose Rejuvenating serum
settings.serum_yellow_info:
• Brightens discolouration, fades dark spots and acne marks, promotes even skin tone and minimizes pores.
  • Formulated with Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF), Niacinamide, Tranexamic Acid.
settings.serum_grey_heading: For fine lines and wrinkles choose Hydra-Soothing serum
settings.serum_grey_info:
• Reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles, helps soothe redness and boosts hydration.
  • Formulated with Beta Glucan, Niacinamide and Tripeptide-1 Peptide.
settings.bl2_list:
• High quality, bright lighting and high resolution imagery/videography to be supplied. No obvious filters.
  • Close-up of the Micro-Infusion device and serums to be the feature in the content. Background must be clean and bright.
  • When demonstrating the application of the product, please do not wear any make-up, or no visible/noticeable makeup and make sure to do a close-up.
  • In cover photos for video content always show yourself using the Qure Micro-Infusion, unless otherwise agreed on with the brand.
settings.bl3_list:
• Tag and mention @qureskincare
  • Include hashtags in caption: #quremicroinfusion #microneedling #microinfusion #athomefacial #antiageing #qure #qureskincare #quremicroinfusion
  • Please include your affiliate link or link provided by Qure in Instagram stories and in captions of YouTube videos. If can’t be placed in BIO then please include in linktree or similar.

settings.heading: Get to know our Micro-Infusion System
settings.pdt_spec_ul:
• 20 pcs
    hypoallergenic surgical needles
  • 24K Gold
    plated micro-needles
  • 0.5mm
    needle length
  • 5mL
    capacity for serum
settings.bl1_list:
• 0.5 mm needles create controlled depth of micro-channels in the top layer of your skin through a "stamping" technique. It “tricks” your skin into activating your body’s natural healing process.
  • Single-use sterile 24 gold plated needle heads help minimize the risk of infection or irritation.
  • Serum of choice (for wrinkles / for dark spots) is infused directly below the skin barrier, accelerating absorption of active ingredients for faster results.
settings.bl2_list:
• Treatment every 2 weeks, at night, for the best results. 
  • Follow pre and post treatment protocol.
  • Make sure to scan the QR-code on the packaging before use or see detailed protocol here.
settings.bl3_list:
• Disposable needle-heads with 24 karat gold-plated needles minimize the risk of infection and irritation
  • Delivers science-backed serums directly to skin to help increase absorption & results
  • Little to no downtime & quick recovery of the skin
  • Offers similar results to in-clinic micro needling
